Name: Swiftgear Helm
Description: A lightweight, aerodynamic helm designed to enhance the wearer's agility and situational awareness.

Name: Swiftgear Jacket
Description: A sleek jacket with reinforced padding, providing mobility without compromising protection.

Name: Swiftgear Gloves
Description: Gloves engineered for dexterity and quick responses, ideal for situations requiring finesse.

Name: Swiftgear Belt
Description: A lightweight belt with utility compartments, designed for rapid access to essential gear.

Name: Swiftgear Pants
Description: Flexible and durable pants, allowing for unencumbered movement in various terrains.

Name: Swiftgear Boots
Description: Advanced boots featuring enhanced grip and support for quick maneuvers.

Name: Techwise Helm
Description: A sophisticated helm integrated with advanced diagnostic tools, enhancing intelligence and strategic decision-making.

Name: Techwise Jacket
Description: A versatile jacket equipped with various tech interfaces, designed to augment the wearer's analytical capabilities.

Name: Techwise Gloves
Description: Precision gloves that facilitate intricate technical work, boosting intelligence and dexterity.

Name: Techwise Belt
Description: An ergonomically designed belt with specialized compartments for various engineering tools, enhancing wisdom.

Name: Techwise Pants
Description: Durable and functional pants, equipped with sensor arrays for environmental analysis and problem-solving.

Name: Techwise Boots
Description: Heavy-duty boots featuring enhanced stability and connectivity to tech systems, aiding in field engineering tasks.
